data.expected_result: The comment stays in the box after the theme change
data.short_description: Changing theme while adding a video attachment with a comment deletes the comment
data.steps_to_repro: - Have both Desktop and iOS Discord open - On iOS, tap to add an attachment where you have permission to add attachments - Tap "Camera Roll" - Select a VIDEO - Begin to type a comment - On Desktop, change your theme - *poof* comment vanished
